Name: Carbon Dioxide
Description: Emitted by Fossil Fuels, Solid Waste, Tree / Wood Products Combustion; Emitted by Industrial Activities e.g. Cement Manufacture; Removed from the atmosphere through absorption by plants

Name: Methane
Description: Emitted by Coal, Natural Gas and Oil Production / Transportation; Emitted by Livestock and other Agricultural Practices; Emitted by decaying Organic Waste in Municipal Solid Waste Landfills

Name: Nitrous Oxide
Description: Emitted by Fossil Fuels and Solid Waste combustion; Emitted by Livestock and other Agricultural Practices; Emitted by Industrial Activities
